fee_codes.description: Postnatal care in hospital/home - initial assessment of a well patient postpartum with subsequent assessments until the patient’s first visit to the physician’s office.
fee_codes.conditions: Specific elements for each visit are those for assessments.

fee_codes.description: Attendance at maternal delivery for newborn care.
Assisted breech delivery including spontaneous delivery to the umbilicus, with extraction of the shoulders, arms and head.

rules: Obstetrical services have specific elements as listed in the Schedule.
Attendance at labour and delivery may not be claimed when a patient is transferred to a second physician for normal obstetrical care.
Medical induction or stimulation of labour may be claimed once per pregnancy by any one physician.
notes: Normal prenatal care includes monthly visits to 28 weeks, followed by visits every 2nd week to 36 weeks, then weekly visits until delivery.
Illnesses associated with pregnancy requiring added visits shall be claimed on a per visit basis.
